The mithril javelin is a type of member's only Ranged ammunition used by the light and heavy ballistas.

They can be fletched by attaching mithril javelin heads to javelin shafts at level 47 Fletching, granting 120 experience per 15 javelins made. They can also be obtained by buying them from the Ranging Guild, the Void Knight Archery Store or from Oobapohk's Javelin Store after Monkey Madness II.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 October 2016
 Hotfix

The Ranged Strength bonus of mithril javelins has been decreased from +100 to +85.[1]

6 May 2016
(update)
  • Mithril javelins are no longer equippable in the Weapon slot, now being equippable in the Ammunition slot as ammo for ballistae.
  • The Ranged Attack bonus has been removed; previously, it was +17.
  • The Ranged Strength bonus has increased from +18 to +100.
22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril javelin(+)" to "Mithril javelin(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril javelin(s)" to "Mithril javelin(p++)".
29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

21 January 2004
(update)

The item became obtainable in the RuneScape 2 Beta.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta cache.

The '''mithril javelin''' is a type of [[Members|member's only]] [[Ranged]] ammunition used by the [[light ballista|light]] and [[heavy ballista]]s.

They can be fletched by attaching [[mithril javelin heads]] to [[javelin shaft]]s at level 47 [[Fletching]], granting 120 experience per 15 javelins made. They can also be obtained by buying them from the [[Ranging Guild]], the [[Void Knight Archery Store]] or from [[Oobapohk's Javelin Store]] after [[Monkey Madness II]].
